nodes.text: EG-58 was a white-plated GNK-series power droid manufactured by Industrial Automaton. In 34 ABY, during the First Order's occupation of the planet Batuu, EG-58 was part of the Resistance forces stationed in Black Spire Outpost on the world. The power droid worked at Resistance Supply, where it stood with fellow droid EG-57 storing power for the Resistance next to a short-range antenna near the stall.

EG-58 first appeared as a prop within the themed land Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, which opened to guests at Disneyland Park and Disney's Hollywood Studios Park in 2019. The prop is capable of emitting various sound effects. The droid simultaneously appeared in the Star Wars: Datapad application launched alongside the themed land, where it was first identified as EG-58, although Galaxy's Edge staff were originally told to refer to it as MB-58. The Hollywood Studios datapad menu confirms that EG-57 is the green droid out of the pair, meaning EG-58 must be the white droid.
